title: Can't log in. Hacked?!
body: I decided to go on pbe today to try the sandbox mode, but the password I always used was not working. I had set my username to remember me from the last time i logged in so I knew that my username was right. I also know that my password worked last time. But this didn't work. I tried going to recover my password so I typed in my account name and checked the emails that I used 5 minutes later. It wasn't on any of the emails that I always used. I tried going onto the PBE section from leagueoflegends.com but that wouldn't work either. I think that my emails, passwords, and username was changed. Does anyone know how I can get my account back?

replies.body:
Your account may have been compromised. I strongly recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K) so one of our recovery specialists can assist you in sorting this out.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
PBE accounts are not forever. Sometimes Riot just disables some accounts. Try to send an email or a ticket.
Who do I send the email to?
